svg.text: Cloud Security Posture Management | Automated Configuration Verification | Compliance Monitoring

g.text: CIS | PCI-DSS | ISMS-P | SOC 2 | NIST CSF | GDPR | HIPAA
S3 Bucket Public Access | IAM Root User Active | Security Group 0.0.0.0/0
RDS Public Access | No MFA on Root | Unencrypted EBS Volumes
Immediate action required - High risk exposure
CloudTrail Disabled | KMS Key Rotation Off | No VPC Flow Logs
IAM User Without MFA | S3 Versioning Off | Unused Access Keys
Tags Missing | Non-Optimal Instance Type | Default VPC Used

svg.text: DataDog CSPM AWS Security Guide | Automated Configuration Verification & Compliance Monitoring | Twodragon's Tech Blog
